plot: A glimpse into the life of 80 year old Louis Nel, a south African immigrant, who left South Africa in 1975 leaving behind a life and a family to begin anew in Paraguay.
title: The Pioneer of Paraguay
plot_es: A glimpse into the life of 80 year old Louis Nel, a south African immigrant, who left South Africa in 1975 leaving behind a life and a family to begin anew in Paraguay.
plot_en: A glimpse into the life of 80 year old Louis Nel, a south African immigrant, who left South Africa in 1975 leaving behind a life and a family to begin anew in Paraguay.
